channel.title: Home on ACM Special Group on Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Home on ACM Special Group on Software Engineering

item.title: Home
item.description: The ACM Special Interest Group on Software Engineering provides a forum for computing professionals from industry, government and academia to examine principles, practices, and new research results in software engineering.

item.title: Awards
item.description: ACM SIGSOFT is responsible, both directly or by encouraging organizers of SIGSOFT-sponsored conferences to designate their recipients, for several different awards.
